statements: SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT policy_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM policyholders;
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM policyholders WHERE state='CA';
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE zip_code='12345';
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT policy_id, first_name, last_name FROM policyholders WHERE state = 'CA' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM policyholders WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31' ORDER BY date_of_birth;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM policyholders WHERE state = 'TX' AND zip_code LIKE '75%' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE city != 'Los Angeles' AND state IN ('CA', 'NY') ORDER BY state, city DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM policyholders WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT policy_type, coverage_amount FROM policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, address, phone_number FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Lane%';
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount FROM policies WHERE coverage_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT policyholders.first_name, policyholders.last_name, policies.coverage_amount FROM policyholders JOIN policies ON policyholders.id = policies.policyholder_id WHERE policies.coverage_amount > 10000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM policies WHERE premium_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM policyholders ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT policyholder_id, first_name, last_name, city, state FROM policyholders WHERE state='California';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM policies WHERE premium > 1000;
SELECT policyholders.first_name, addresses.street_address, addresses.city FROM policyholders JOIN addresses ON policyholders.policyholder_id = addresses.policyholder_id;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM policyholders WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT p.policy_id, p.policyholder_id, ph.first_name, ph.last_name, p.policy_type, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM policies p JOIN policyholders ph ON p.policyholder_id = ph.policyholder_id;
SELECT ph.first_name, ph.last_name, a.street_address, a.city, a.state, a.zip_code FROM policyholders ph JOIN addresses a ON ph.policyholder_id = a.policyholder_id WHERE a.state = 'CA';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS policyholders_count, AVG(premium) AS avg_premium FROM policies;
SELECT * FROM policyholder_info;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM policyholder_info ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, coverage_amount FROM insurance_policies WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT policyholder_id, address FROM policyholder_info WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM policy_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholder_info WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM policyholder_info ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT MAX(coverage_amount) AS max_coverage FROM insurance_policies;
SELECT policyholder_id, COUNT(policy_id) AS num_claims FROM insurance_policies GROUP BY policyholder_id HAVING num_claims > 1;

SELECT policyholder_id, first_name, last_name, claim_amount FROM policyholder_info JOIN insurance_policies ON policyholder_info.policyholder_id = insurance_policies.policyholder_id JOIN policy_claims ON insurance_policies.policy_id = policy_claims.policy_id WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name FROM policyholders WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policyholder_contacts ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT policyholder_id, coverage_amount FROM policyholder_liability WHERE coverage_amount > 1000;
SELECT policyholder_id, vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM policyholder_vehicles WHERE vehicle_year < 2010;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT * FROM policyholders ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT ph.first_name, ph.last_name, pl.coverage_amount, pl.start_date FROM policyholders ph INNER JOIN policyholder_liability pl ON ph.id = pl.policyholder_id;

SELECT ph.first_name, ph.last_name, pv.vehicle_make, pv.vehicle_model, pv.vehicle_year FROM policyholders ph INNER JOIN policyholder_vehicles pv ON ph.id = pv.policyholder_id ORDER BY pv.vehicle_year ASC;
